story: A family-run farm for over 50 years, specializing in organic tomatoes, lettuce, and carrots. We believe in sustainable agriculture.
Home to the sweetest apples, peaches, and berries. We use natural methods to grow the most flavorful fruit you've ever tasted.
We raise happy, free-range chickens, providing the freshest eggs in the region. Our small vegetable patch offers seasonal greens.
Known for our potatoes, onions, and garlic. We provide the essential ingredients for all your favorite home-cooked meals.
